mdRecord.dcterms:title: Earl Palmer and Harry Roberson 1966
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Earl Palmer and Homer Arelus Roberson seen at Roberson Mill. Homer Roberson was the owner/operator of the mill. Photographer, Earl Palmer and Homer Roberson at Roberson Mill in 1966 shortly before Mr. Roberson's death under the mill wheel.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Palmer, Earl
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
